misc: Famous for being an ambassador for the AimPoint method for putting.
biography: Timo, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, hails from Keimola Golf and is preparing to make his ninth appearance in the upcoming edition of the tournament. Over the years, Timo has carved out a reputation as a formidable competitor, known for his strategic approach and unwavering focus on the course. He has secured the coveted Hector Trophée on three occasions, demonstrating his prowess in pair play.

Beyond his achievements on the course, Timo is widely recognized as an ambassador for the AimPoint method for putting, showcasing his commitment to the technical aspects of the game. While he is yet to clinch the Victor Trophy, his consistent performances underscore his dedication and skill.

Off the course, Timo is known for his calm demeanor and sportsmanship, earning him the respect and admiration of his fellow competitors. As he gears up for Hector Trophée 2025, Timo will undoubtedly be one to watch, as he continues to make his mark on the tournament.
